hypothesis_content.title: Contrarian BTC Futures Backwardation Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC perpetual futures funding rates turn significantly negative (below -0.02% per 8h) during NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes while BTC price holds above its 30-day volume-weighted average price (VWAP), a mean reversion long entry will generate positive alpha within 72 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme negative funding during low volatility suggests excessive short positioning by retail/leveraged traders. When combined with price holding above VWAP (institutional support level), this creates asymmetric risk/reward for contrarian longs as forced covering occurs.
entry_conditions: No extreme fear in Crypto Fear & Greed Index (>20)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Funding rate returns to positive OR 5% price appreciation
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Funding rate drops below -0.05% OR price breaks below 30-day VWAP by 3%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Negative funding persists beyond 72 hours while price continues declining, indicating structural bearishness rather than temporary sentiment extreme.
